name: UltraKnight
description:
Ultraknight is a 2D game, the nameless knight climb on a square platform to resist waves of enemies until the light comes.

W - GO UP

A- GO LEFT

S - GO DOWN

D - GO RIGHT

K - ATTACK (A)

L - BARRIER (B)

Enter - SUBMIT

RightShift - BACK TO MENU

Barrier is a special ability that can make u be Invincible for 2 sec.

Barrier has cool down under the hearts.


Game Designer: Ricky Lyu

Game Programmer: Ricky Lyu

Game Artist：Gary Feng

Game VFX Artist: Gary Feng

Game Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rBljESY7sJUt

Music from Freesound: https://freesound.org/
